summary: A self-made millionaire, an art professor and a banker swap priceless art with forgeries and make off with the goods.
cast: Douglas Henshall|Stephen Fry|Kenneth Collard|Lenora Crichlow|Brian McCardie|Elliot Cowan|Philip Whitchurch|Paul McCole|Jordan Young|Rab Affleck|Raymond Mearns|Gilly Gilchrist|Robin Laing|Niall Greig Fulton|Kenny Blyth|Gary McCormack|Sarah McCardie|Bobby Rainsbury|Ellie O'Brien|Kirstin McLean|Canan Avsar|Ben Bradley|Luke Oscar Ford|Ling Law|Robert Yates
title: Doors Open
